name: wems-mcp-server
description: Comprehensive natural hazard monitoring MCP server with 4 authoritative data sources: earthquakes (USGS), tsunamis (NOAA), volcanoes (Smithsonian GVP), and solar events (NOAA Space Weather). Features configurable webhooks, geographic filtering, and real-time alerting.

tools.name: check_earthquakes
tools.description: Query recent earthquake activity from USGS with magnitude and geographic filtering

tools.name: check_tsunamis
tools.description: Monitor tsunami warnings from NOAA Pacific and Central Warning Centers

tools.name: check_volcanoes
tools.description: Track volcanic activity alerts from Smithsonian Global Volcanism Program

tools.name: check_solar
tools.description: Monitor space weather events including solar flares, CMEs, and geomagnetic storms

tools.name: configure_alerts
tools.description: Update alert thresholds and webhook configurations for proactive monitoring

configuration.description: Optional configuration for alert thresholds and webhook endpoints

features: 4 authoritative data sources (USGS, NOAA x2, Smithsonian)
